title: Add Ogg Vorbis/Opus to AudioEncodingProperties
body: It would be extremely helpful to be able to create MediaSourceStreams for audio streams in the Vorbis and/or Opus formats. In my case, I need this functionality for implementing Shoutcast/Icecast functionality.

comments.body: It looks like this is the solution: https://github.com/Microsoft/FFmpegInterop
at least provide UWP sample, or as part of Community Tookit. I also vote for Speex
